block.p: GREENBERG-Herbert. Of Great Neck, New York on Saturday, July 25, 1998. Beloved husband of Rosalie ''Mickey'' Brown; loving father of Edward ''Woody'', Betsy Feinberg (Robert), Amy Poster (Robert), and Susan Piper (Gordon); adored grandfather of Cara Feinberg, Guy Greenberg, and Joanna, Tracy and Michael Piper; devoted son of the late Charles and Jennie Greenberg; brother of Gladys Goldstein (Murray), the late Leo Greenberg, and the late Rose Rabbino; loving uncle and dear friend. Former Chairman and CEO of Charles Greenberg & Sons, Inc.; Captain in the U.S. Army during World War II; dedicated and active leader of many philanthropic and community organizations. Funeral will be held at Temple Beth El of Great Neck, NY on Monday, July 27 at 1:30 PM.
